ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class AppModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.AppModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Claim, ClaimList, Destination, Item, Receipt, Tag

    public class AppModel
extends Object
    The AppModel class can create an ArrayList named listeners, which contains Listener subject. This class can set up listeners, add a Listener to listeners, remove a listener from listeners, notify listeners for updates, set up missValue.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    ArrayList, HashSet, Set

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppModel()
      General construction.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the ArrayList listeners
      void addModelListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the modelListeners if the model does not contains a Listener l
      boolean getMissValue()
      return the missValue.
      void notifyListeners()
      This method is design for notifying all Listener in listeners ArrayList and modelListeners ArrayList if there's any update, and the ClaimListManager will save the change
      void removeListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to remove a Listener from the listeners ArrayList.
      void removeModelListener(Listener l)
      This method is designed to remove a Listener from the modelListeners ArrayList
      void setMissValue(boolean b)
      Set missValue to b, and notify all Listener in listeners ArrayList and modelListeners ArrayList about this update.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppModel

        public AppModel()
        General construction. This method creates an ArrayList listeners and an ArrayList modelListers for listeners that records all Listener.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(Listener l)
        This method allows user to add a Listener to the ArrayList listeners
        Parameters:
        l - a Listener type

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(Listener l)
        This method allows user to remove a Listener from the listeners ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        l - a Listener type

      • notifyListeners

        public void notifyListeners()
        This method is design for notifying all Listener in listeners ArrayList and modelListeners ArrayList if there's any update, and the ClaimListManager will save the change

      • addModelListener

        public void addModelListener(Listener l)
        This method allows user to add a Listener to the modelListeners if the model does not contains a Listener l
        Parameters:
        l - a Listener type

      • removeModelListener

        public void removeModelListener(Listener l)
        This method is designed to remove a Listener from the modelListeners ArrayList
        Parameters:
        l - a Listener type

      • setMissValue

        public void setMissValue(boolean b)
        Set missValue to b, and notify all Listener in listeners ArrayList and modelListeners ArrayList about this update.
        Parameters:
        b - a boolean type b

      • getMissValue

        public boolean getMissValue()
        return the missValue. This method will be used when user needs to use the value of missValue to justify the AppModel.
        Returns:
        missValue a boolean type
